Reading List

Reading to me is a window into other worlds. This section will just be a running tab of interesting articles, books, podcasts, or newsletters that I've read and would like to discuss. Yes, I know podcasts don't count as reading, but I think they serve much of the same purpose as reading. Personal reading such as science fiction/fantasy books will be listed on the about me portion of my website.
